verses.esv: 12 For the word of God is living and active, sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing to the division of soul and of spirit, of joints and of marrow, and discerning the thoughts and intentions of the heart.
verses.kjv: 12 For the word of God is quick, and powerful, and sharper than any twoedged sword, piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit, and of the joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
verses.niv: 12 For the word of God is living and active. Sharper than any double--edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow; it judges the thoughts and attitudes of the heart.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness,
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness,

verses.esv: 17 So faith comes from hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ.
verses.kjv: 17 So then faith cometh by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.
verses.niv: 17 Consequently, faith comes from hearing the message, and the message is heard through the word of Christ.

verses.esv: 16 For I am not ashamed of the gospel, for it is the power of God for salvation to everyone who believes, to the Jew first and also to the Greek.
verses.kjv: 16 For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ: for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth; to the Jew first, and also to the Greek.
verses.niv: 16 I am not ashamed of the gospel, because it is the power of God for the salvation of everyone who believes: first for the Jew, then for the Gentile.

verses.esv: 22 But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves.
verses.kjv: 22 But be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves.
verses.niv: 22 Do not merely listen to the word, and so deceive yourselves. Do what it says.

verses.esv: 23 since you have been born again, not of perishable seed but of imperishable, through the living and abiding word of God;
verses.kjv: 23 Being born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, by the word of God, which liveth and abideth for ever.
verses.niv: 23 For you have been born again, not of perishable seed, but of imperishable, through the living and enduring word of God.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness, 17 that the man of God may be complete, equipped for every good work.
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness: 17 That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness, 17 so that the man of God may be thoroughly equipped for every good work.

verses.esv: 32 And now I commend you to God and to the word of his grace, which is able to build you up and to give you the inheritance among all those who are sanctified.
verses.kjv: 32 And now, brethren, I commend you to God, and to the word of his grace, which is able to build you up, and to give you an inheritance among all them which are sanctified.
verses.niv: 32 "Now I commit you to God and to the word of his grace, which can build you up and give you an inheritance among all those who are sanctified.

verses.esv:
Nun

105   Your word is a lamp to my feet
    and a light to my path.
verses.kjv: 105 Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
verses.niv: 105 Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light for my path.

verses.esv: 13 And we also thank God constantly for this, that when you received the word of God, which you heard from us, you accepted it not as the word of men but as what it really is, the word of God, which is at work in you believers.
verses.kjv: 13 For this cause also thank we God without ceasing, because, when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us, ye received it not as the word of men, but as it is in truth, the word of God, which effectually worketh also in you that believe.
verses.niv: 13 And we also thank God continually because, when you received the word of God, which you heard from us, you accepted it not as the word of men, but as it actually is, the word of God, which is at work in you who believe.

verses.esv:
16   Your words were found, and I ate them,
    and your words became to me a joy
    and the delight of my heart,
  for I am called by your name,
    O LORD, God of hosts.
verses.kjv: 16 Thy words were found, and I did eat them; and thy word was unto me the joy and rejoicing of mine heart: for I am called by thy name, O LORD God of hosts.
verses.niv: 16 When your words came, I ate them; they were my joy and my heart's delight, for I bear your name, O LORD God Almighty.

verses.esv:
11   so shall my word be that goes out from my mouth;
    it shall not return to me empty,
  but it shall accomplish that which I purpose,
    and shall succeed in the thing for which I sent it.
verses.kjv: 11 So shall my word be that goeth forth out of my mouth: it shall not return unto me void, but it shall accomplish that which I please, and it shall prosper in the thing whereto I sent it.
verses.niv: 11 so is my word that goes out from my mouth: It will not return to me empty, but will accomplish what I desire and achieve the purpose for which I sent it.

verses.esv:
20   He sent out his word and healed them,
    and delivered them from their destruction.
verses.kjv: 20 He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.
verses.niv: 20 He sent forth his word and healed them; he rescued them from the grave.

verses.esv: 17 Sanctify them in the truth; your word is truth.
verses.kjv: 17 Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
verses.niv: 17 Sanctify them by the truth; your word is truth.

verses.esv:
4 But he answered, “It is written,

  “‘Man shall not live by bread alone,
    but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.’”
verses.kjv: 4 But he answered and said, It is written, Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.
verses.niv: 4 Jesus answered, "It is written: 'Man does not live on bread alone, but on every word that comes from the mouth of God.'"

verses.esv: 3 Already you are clean because of the word that I have spoken to you.
verses.kjv: 3 Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.
verses.niv: 3 You are already clean because of the word I have spoken to you.

verses.esv:
11   I have stored up your word in my heart,
    that I might not sin against you.
verses.kjv: 11 Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.
verses.niv: 11 I have hidden your word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

verses.esv: 29 Let no corrupting talk come out of your mouths, but only such as is good for building up, as fits the occasion, that it may give grace to those who hear.
verses.kjv: 29 Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.
verses.niv: 29 Do not let any unwholesome talk come out of your mouths, but only what is helpful for building others up according to their needs, that it may benefit those who listen.

verses.esv:
21   Death and life are in the power of the tongue,
    and those who love it will eat its fruits.
verses.kjv: 21 Death and life are in the power of the tongue: and they that love it shall eat the fruit thereof.
verses.niv: 21 The tongue has the power of life and death, and those who love it will eat its fruit.

verses.esv: 21 Therefore put away all filthiness and rampant wickedness and receive with meekness the implanted word, which is able to save your souls.
verses.kjv: 21 Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness, and receive with meekness the engrafted word, which is able to save your souls.
verses.niv: 21 Therefore, get rid of all moral filth and the evil that is so prevalent and humbly accept the word planted in you, which can save you.

verses.esv:
18   There is one whose rash words are like sword thrusts,
    but the tongue of the wise brings healing.
verses.kjv: 18 There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.
verses.niv: 18 Reckless words pierce like a sword, but the tongue of the wise brings healing.

verses.esv:
8   The grass withers, the flower fades,
    but the word of our God will stand forever.
verses.kjv: 8 The grass withereth, the flower fadeth: but the word of our God shall stand for ever.
verses.niv: 8 The grass withers and the flowers fall, but the word of our God stands forever."

verses.esv: 18 For the word of the cross is folly to those who are perishing, but to us who are being saved it is the power of God.
verses.kjv: 18 For the preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God.
verses.niv: 18 For the message of the cross is foolishness to those who are perishing, but to us who are being saved it is the power of God.

verses.esv: 7 And the word of God continued to increase, and the number of the disciples multiplied greatly in Jerusalem, and a great many of the priests became obedient to the faith.
verses.kjv: 7 And the word of God increased; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith.
verses.niv: 7 So the word of God spread. The number of disciples in Jerusalem increased rapidly, and a large number of priests became obedient to the faith.

verses.esv: 63 It is the Spirit who gives life; the flesh is no help at all. The words that I have spoken to you are spirit and life.
verses.kjv: 63 It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.
verses.niv: 63 The Spirit gives life; the flesh counts for nothing. The words I have spoken to you are spirit and they are life.
